text: Nagra nunamu nehuankino antahintahitamofona masa tamina, tamagu'amofo avurgamo hari nehanigetma, Agrama kezatino fore hugahie huno tamagima nehiazana, tamagra kegahaze. Mizama'a mareri'nea zantmi, hihamu'ane msazama'afi Anumzamo'a tamina, Agrite mani ruotge nehaza vahe'mo'zane, tamagra erigahaze.
